replies.body:
Best thing to do would be to either send a ticket to [**Riot Games Player Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or tweet out to [**@RiotSupport**](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) on Twitter. 

They'll be able to give you a little bit of extra RP so you can make that purchase without necessarily purchasing some more RP. Keep in mind that your chances of getting this request is higher if you can submit some of your own player-created content like a poem, song, picture, etc. This request can only be granted once per account per lifetime, so make it count! :)

Good luck!
